descriptions.title: Ritual Text Related to the Disciple
descriptions.content:
Description

Bod rgya tshig mdzod chen mo: dbang gi sta gon gyi cho ga ste/ kun slong bcos shing nang dbang bskur ba/ gsol ba gdab cing 'dzin du gzhug pa/ sdom pa gzung zhing byin gyis brlab pa/ dngos grub brtag phyir so shing dor ba/ ngag nyes sbyang phyir khyor chu blud pa/ rmi ngan bzlog phyir ku sha gtad pa/ bar chad zhi phyir dpung skud gdags pa/ spro ba bskyed phyir chos bshad pa/ mtshan ltas brtag phyir rmi lam brtag pa rnams so/; slob ma rjes su ‘dzin pa

Example Texts

  • Gsang ‘dus dbang gi slob ma’i sta gon cho ga 
  • Dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i lha lnga'i dbang gi slob ma sta gon gi skor rim pa gzhung 'grel
